name: VIRGIN ATLANTIC UPPER CLASS: What's it like?
description:
I flew Virgin Atlantic in Upper Class on their Dreamliner 787-9 from London Heathrow to Miami. What's it like? Here's my review
#Virginatlantic #upperclass #businessclass #virginbusinessclass

My flight reviews are unbiased and provide an honest encounter of what it's like to fly on Virgin Atlantic's business class product. 
Flight time was around 9.5 hours for this trip, during the daytime. It gave me the opportunity to experience their inflight food and drink as well as their flat bed. Furthermore they also have an inflight bar which offers drinks, snacks and made to order food. 

Let me know what you think as always below

Follow me on IG: instagram.com/will.luxurytravel/

Music used:

"Expectations"
Instrumental by Temper Beats
